definition: to broadcast over a network/(radio or TV) hookup/simulcast
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]

sentences.english: Xing Zhibin, and Luo Jing anchor the 7p. m. "Network News Broadcast"on China Central Television.
sentences.chinese: 央視邢質斌，羅京主持晚7點的《新聞聯播》。

sentences.english: Many local stations have been networked now.
sentences.chinese: 現在許多地方臺的節目已在全國聯播。

sentences.english: The simulcast is a first for competing networks.
sentences.chinese: 這是相互競爭的電視網第一次進行同時聯播。

sentences.english: They have made a decision about which programmes are to be networked .
sentences.chinese: 關於哪些節目將被聯播他們已作出了決定。

sentences.english: The president's speech is broadcast on a national television network.
sentences.chinese: 總統演說由全國電視網聯播。

sentences.english: Is it the news report at 7 p. m. on CCTV-1?
sentences.chinese: 是中央一臺每晚7點的新聞聯播嗎？

sentences.english: I want to see the seven-o'clock news report.
sentences.chinese: 我想攔七點鐘的新聞聯播。

sentences.english: In what way do you wish to see Xinwen Lianbo reform?
sentences.chinese: 你希望《新聞聯播》怎麼改版？

sentences.english: The President's speech was broadcast on a .
sentences.chinese: 總統演說由全國電視網聯播。

sentences.english: My love for you, until the day of the news broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 我對你的愛，一直到新聞聯播大結局那天。

sentences.english: I relax at home with my family and watch the CCTV news broadcasting every day (CCTV is Chinese Central Television, the primary state operated television network).
sentences.chinese: 俺就和家裏人聚聚，每天看看《新聞聯播》。

sentences.english: The President's speech was broadcast on a national television network .
sentences.chinese: 總統演說由全國電視網聯播。

definition: abbr. for 北愛爾蘭|北爱尔兰[Bei3 Ai4 er3 lan2], Northern Ireland
Chinese Television System (CTS), Taiwan (abbr. for 中華電視|中华电视[Zhong1 hua2 Dian4 shi4])
barrage (military)/"bullet screen", function which allows viewers to post on-screen comments in videos, movies etc in real time/danmaku (video game subgenre)
millions of people all of one mind (idiom); the people united

State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television (SAPPRFT), est. 2013 (abbr. for 國家新聞出版廣電總局|国家新闻出版广电总局[Guo2 jia1 Xin1 wen2 Chu1 ban3 Guang3 dian4 Zong3 ju2])/(prior to 2013) State Administration of Radio, Film, and Television (SARFT)
Global Times (weekly digest of international news from People's Daily 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4])
